title: Giant blowfly
data:
{{obsolete}} {{monster |name=giant blowfly |glyph={{LightGrey|y}} |tile=[[File:Giant blowfly.png]] |flags={{No skeleton flag}}
{{Flying flag}}
{{Batty flag}} |resistances=none |vulnerabilities={{Poison vulnerability}} |max_chunks=1 |meat={{Contaminated corpse}} |xp=178 |holiness={{Natural}} |magic_resistance=? |hp_range=15 to 40 |avg_hp=27 |armour_class=2 |evasion=15 |habitat=land |speed=19 |size={{Tiny}} |item_use={{Uses nothing}} |attack1=13 ({{Bite type}}: {{Plain flavour}}) |attack2= |attack3= |attack4= |hit_dice=5 |base_hp=3 |extra_hp=5 |fixed_hp=0 |intelligence={{Animal intelligence}} |genus=giant blowfly |species=giant blowfly }} {{Flavour|A huge and irritating fly.}} ==Useful Info== A '''giant blowfly''' is a very fast creature, similar to [[giant mosquito]]es without the sickening bite. Eating its corpse may cause [[sickness]]. They appear in groups and are commonly found in [[the Swamp]]. ==Tips & Tricks== [[Poison]] is very effective against them. ==History== Giant blowflies were removed from the game in [[0.8]]. [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
